bibl.title: How Did Egyptian Scribes Calculate Net Drachmae in West Bank Tax Receipts?
bibl.note: The scribes, if they ever used a table of conversions of gross amounts into net amounts of money, used it with a rather liberal hand, i.e. they did not always take care to calculate net amounts precisely down to the last 2 chalcus-piece.
bibl.seg: Worp Klaas Anthony, How Did Egyptian Scribes Calculate Net Drachmae in West Bank Tax Receipts?
